short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access to the official Brosix (web version) in a stand-alone window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brosix is a cross-platform secure team instant messaging solution specifically built for teams, groups, companies and corporations. The Brosix app brings this secure team communication to your mobile device, allowing you to stay connected on the go. The app comes with a full range of features that allow you to securely communicate and collaborate with your team from anywhere.
